name: chemfiles
description: Modern library for chemistry trajectories reading and writing

scripts.build-libchemfiles: cmake -E make_directory lib build && cd build && emcmake cmake .. && cmake --build . && npm run copy-libchemfiles
scripts.copy-libchemfiles: cmake -E copy build/libchemfiles.js lib/libchemfiles.js && cmake -E copy build/libchemfiles.wasm lib/libchemfiles.wasm

author: Guillaume Fraux <guillaume.fraux@epfl.ch>
